name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
"Working Like This for Thirty Years" Xi'an Banpo Edition
Netizen Enzo explored the Xi'an Banpo labor market during the Spring Festival, focusing on the living conditions of Xi'an's lower-class elderly workers

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Currently, the death toll has risen to 15.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
At present, the Douban entry of Wang Xiaoshuai's "Fertile Soil" has been removed.
A week ago, "Fertile Soil" announced that it would participate in the 74th Berlin Film Festival without passing the review, which triggered heated public debate.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 22, a former Pinduoduo employee with the Weibo account name "Cao Wa Story" lost contact after being sued by Pinduoduo for 280,000 yuan for triggering a non-compete agreement. The user expressed pessimism in his last Weibo post: "If I disappear, will Pinduoduo no longer target me? Do my parents need to repay this debt?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 23, the Eastern Theater Command released a poster titled "Go Home." This triggered a wave of ridicule in the comment section. Netizens accused the Eastern Theater Command of "being self-satisfied," "having fun all day," "liberating Taiwan by posting Weibo posters," "internal propaganda pacifiers," "who would believe it?" "Don't fool yourself," and so on.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 24, lawyer Zhang Xinnian posted a screenshot on Weibo, which showed that "Dai Lili from Machang Police Station" asked "Don't panic if you see a fire, don't post the video on WeChat Moments or TikTok, if you post it online and cause bad public opinion, you will be held legally responsible... Don't ask, don't say."
According to netizens' inquiries, Dai Lili is an auxiliary police officer at Machang Police Station in Gui'an New District, Guiyang City.
This type of notice is usually conveyed by the above requirements.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The good citizens that Guiyang Municipal Government hopes to be like:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 23, at a press conference held by the Supreme People's Court, Liao Xiangyang, director of the Supreme People's Court Supervision Bureau, said that there is no need to find someone to file a lawsuit. It doesn't matter whether you find someone or not. The court will handle it according to the law.
This attracted a lot of complaints from netizens

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Video of the fire scene in Nanjing Mingshang Xiyuan Community on February 23
Residents shouting for help from upstairs.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 24, after a fire broke out in Nanjing Mingshang Xiyuan Community, some netizens took photos of the leaders wearing brand new rain boots and leaving with smiles on their faces. 
At present, the accident has caused 15 deaths and 44 people have been hospitalized for treatment, including 1 critically ill and 1 seriously ill

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
A supermarket in Shilianzi Town, Junan County, Linyi City, Shandong Province, announced that it would close down because it could not afford the huge fine from the fire department.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"The Fall of China's AI Godfather"
On February 24, CCTV-2 reported in length on the internet celebrity Li Yizhou.
As AI became popular, Li Yizhou accurately entered the market to sell his "AI courses", attracting 1 million fans in a month, with daily course sales exceeding 500,000. Netizens joked that he was the "China's AI Godfather" on par with Altman.
However, his courses encountered a large number of complaints from students on the complaint platform
At present, Li Yizhou's account can no longer be followed, and the relevant courses have been removed from the shelves.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, it was reported online that Jiangxi universities are investigating student self-media. In the appendix to the summary form, there are options such as "whether the content is negative", "whether it is included in the management of the Internet Information Team", and "whether it obeys orders and has a reliable stance".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 24 (Release) Erhezhuang Village, Beijing.
Dozens of plainclothes officers broke into a private residence and forcibly carried away a resident. The reason for being carried away is suspected to be related to petitioning.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 21, Fuxin, Liaoning. Fuxin Cotton Textile Co., Ltd. failed to pay workers' pension insurance, and a large number of workers gathered in front of the city government to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 24, in Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region, Hengfeng Textile Factory not only owed workers wages, but also owed workers social security. A large number of workers gathered outside the company to defend their rights.
